summary: A young couple and their daughter move into an old house hanted by spirits.
cast: Anne Birgitte Lind|Jakob Cedergren|Rebecca Løgstrup|Dejan Cukic|Andrea Vagn Jensen|Lykke Sand|Zlatko Buric|Thure Lindhardt|Jens Okking|Morten Suurballe|Jan Hertz|Laura Christensen|Pelle Kastrup|Albert Bendix|Ole Drost|Daniel Faber Therms|Per Andersen|Christina Therms|Lis Lindstad|Pittie Kristiansen|Ronya Lina Larsson|Pernilla Larsson|Tine Høst|Birthe Jensen|Marcella Linstad Dichmann
title: Bag det stille ydre
